name: multibank-automation
description: Production-grade Web UI Automation Framework for MultiBank trading platform using Playwright, Cucumber BDD, and TypeScript

scripts.test:parallel:headed:trace: npm run test:parallel:headed && npm run trace:latest
scripts.test:matrix:parallel: (BROWSER=chromium npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --tags "@content") & p1=$!; (BROWSER=firefox npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --tags "@navigation") & p2=$!; (BROWSER=webkit npx cucumber-js --config cucumber.js --tags "@trading") & p3=$!; wait $p1; s1=$?; wait $p2; s2=$?; wait $p3; s3=$?; [ $s1 -eq 0 ] && [ $s2 -eq 0 ] && [ $s3 -eq 0 ]
scripts.test:matrix:parallel:trace: npm run test:matrix:parallel && npm run trace:latest
scripts.trace:latest: LATEST_TRACE=$(ls -t test-results/traces/*.zip 2>/dev/null | head -n 1); if [ -n "$LATEST_TRACE" ]; then echo "Opening trace: $LATEST_TRACE"; npx playwright show-trace "$LATEST_TRACE"; else echo "No trace file found in test-results/traces"; fi
scripts.clean: rm -rf allure-results test-results logs && mkdir -p allure-results test-results/screenshots test-results/traces logs
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open

author: QA Automation Team
